snippet.title: Geneforge 2 - Infestation Trailer
snippet.description:
Geneforge 2 - Infestation is a wildly open-ended fantasy adventure in a unique fantasy world. Use battle or diplomacy and trickery to change the world, served by an army of custom-made mutant monsters. Almost 90 zones to explore and 50+ hours of gameplay. Enormous range of abilities, factions, quests, and paths to victory.

Wishlist the game on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2480560/Geneforge_2__Infestation/

Get more information at:

https://www.spiderwebsoftware.com/geneforge2/index.html
